thread.title: Art
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Art

author: Art
title: Art
text: I liked having Optima Tax Relief on my side when I had some IRS tax problems. The various people I worked with were friendly, efficient and helpful. They represented my interests zealously and with success. What was a very stressful situation for me was made less so by working with Optima. They saved me time, money and aggravation that I was afraid I was going to face as a result of my tax issues.
